content:
The chunk defines a section of a graphical user interface (GUI) tool for managing a particle system's position and orientation within a particle system configuration page. The code creates vector input widgets for specifying the particle system's position (Pos) and orientation (Hpr), allowing users to interactively set these values and pop up a placement panel for precise adjustments. This is part of a larger particle system management tool, likely used in 3D graphics or simulation environments.

# Vector widgets
        pos = self.createVector3Entry(systemPage, 'System', 'Pos',
                                      'Particle system position',
                                      command = self.setSystemPos)
        pos.addMenuItem('Popup Placer Panel', Placer.Placer)
        hpr = self.createVector3Entry(systemPage, 'System', 'Hpr',
                                     'Particle system orientation',
                                      fGroup_labels = ('H', 'P', 'R'),
                                      command = self.setSystemHpr)
        hpr.addMenuItem('Popup Placer Panel', Placer.Placer)
